lexUnit.name: reason.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a cause, explanation, or justification

sentence.text: This was one reason why feminists such as Griffin have argued that studies of girls should be done by women and they have often preferred the use of qualitative methods such as in-depth interviewing or ethnography .
